.
Sending a Copy of the Award to SSA
Send one copy of the award document print and two copies of the award letter being sent to the claimant to the SSA Program Service Center (PSC) from which the
SSA Form 101
,
SSA Form 101C
, or
SSA Form 101U3
was received.
